pull.title: WIP: Encapsulate consensus and policy code
pull.body:
This is a work in progress. I'm trying to isolate consensus and policy code and this is my longest branch on that.
I will open other PRs extracting subsets of this, but people interested in this work can see a unified thing here and hopefully I will e able to get some feedback.
Please don't comment on individual commits as this will be rebased very often (or do it, just be aware that your comments will probably disappear soon).
So far this contains:

**\* WAIT_REVIEW MOVEONLY-ish: Preparations to not include main.h from any other header #5681 [main_includes]
**\* WAIT_REVIEW Cleanup: Don't include main.h from any other header #5697 [main_includes2]
**\* WAIT_REVIEW MOVEONLY: Move constants and globals to consensus.h and policy.o #5696 [consensus_policy0]
**\* WAIT_REVIEW Consensus: Move CheckTransaction() from main to consensus/consensus #5669 [consensus](on main_includes)
**\* WAIT_REVIEW Refactor: Create CCoinsViewEfficient interface for CCoinsViewCache #5747
**\* WAIT_REVIEW Policy: Create CPolicy interface and CStandardPolicy class implementing it #5595 [policy]
**\* WAIT_REVIEW Change: Refactor: inline main:GetMinRelayFee() in main:AcceptToMemoryPool() #5709 [getminrelayfee]
**\* WAIT_REVIEW TRIVIAL: Refactor: inline CTxIn::IsFinal() [ only used in main::IsFinalTx() ] #5769 [isfinal]

events.message: Consensus: Create consensus/consensus.h with some constants
Consensus: Refactor: Decouple CValidationState from main::AbortNode()
Consensus: MOVEONLY: Move CValidationState from main consensus/validation
Consensus: Refactor: turn main::GetBlockValue() into GetBlockSubsidy(Consensus::Params)
Consensus: Refactor: Decouple IsSuperMajority from Params()
Consensus: SQUASHME: Cleanup: remove Consensus::Params getters from CChainParams

Consensus: Cleanup: remove Consensus::Params getters from CChainParams

s/Params().HashGenesisBlock()/params.hashGenesisBlock

Consensus: Refactor: Decouple from CChainParams: CheckBlockHeader,
CheckBlock, ContextualCheckBlockHeader and ContextualCheckBlock
Consensus: Tests: Correct pow tests
Consensus: Move Params().GetConsensus() up
Consensus: Refactor: Consensus version of CheckBlockHeader()
Consensus: Separate CheckIndexAgainstCheckpoint() from ContextualCheckBlockHeader
Consensus: Refactor: Consensus version of ContextualCheckBlockHeader()
Policy: Create policy.o with some constants and globals
Consensus: MOVEONLY: Move CheckBlockHeader, IsSuperMajority and ContextualCheckBlockHeader() to consensus.o
Consensus: MOVEONLY: move pow.o to consensus dir
Consensus: Introduce Consensus::VerifyBlockHeader()

Consensus: Refactor: CheckTransaction() -> Consensus::CheckTx()

Decouple it from util.h [bool error(char*)] and BOOST_FOREACH
Consensus: MOVEONLY-ish: Move GetLegacySigOpCount() from main to consensus
Consensus: Refactor: Turn main::CheckBlock() into Consensus::CheckBlock()
Consensus: MOVEONLY: Move CheckTx and CheckBlock from main to consensus
Includes: fix hidden dependencies
Coins: Refactor: Separate CCoinsViewEfficient abstract class from CCoinsViewCache (make parent its class)
Coins: MOVEONLY: Move CCoinsViewCache and CCoinsModifier to coinscache.o
move Consensus::GetBlockSubsidy
Consensus: MOVEONLY: GetP2SHSigOpCount() from main to consensus
Consensus: Introduce Consensus::GetSigOpCount(CTransaction, CCoinsViewEfficient)
Consensus: Refactor: Separate Consensus::CheckTxInputs from CheckInputs
Consensus: Refactor: Move  CTransaction::GetValueOut() to Consensus
Consensus: MOVEONLY-ish: Move MAX_MONEY and MoneyRange() [renamed VerifyAmount] from amount.h to consensus.h
Consensus: Refactor: Introduce GetSpendHeight()
Consensus: Refactor: Safely remove !tx.IsCoinBase() check from main::CheckInputs()
Consensus: MOVEONLY: Consensus::CheckTxInputs() from main to consensus
Consensus: Refactor: Separate CheckInputs() into CheckInputsScripts and Consensus::CheckTxInputs()
fix Consensus::GetValueOut
Consensus: Refactor: Decouple CheckInputsScripts() from global nScriptCheckThreads (remove pvChecks param)
Consensus: Introduce Consensus::CheckTxInputsScripts() and use it instead of CheckInputsScripts() when possible

Consensus: Refactor: Introduce Consensus::GetFlags

and use it instead of MANDATORY_SCRIPT_VERIFY_FLAGS in miner::CreateNewBlock()
Consensus: Refactor: Separate consensus version of IsFinalTx()
Consensus: Refactor: Consensus version of Consensus::ContextualCheckBlock()
Consensus: MOVEONLY: Move IsFinalTx and ContextualCheckBlock to consensus.o and hide IsSuperMajority()
Consensus: Introduce Consensus::VerifyTx()
Consensus: Refactor: Introduce Consensus::EnforceBIP30
Consensus: Introduce Consensus::VerifyBlock()
Policy: Prepare utils for policy
Policy: Create CPolicy interface and CStandardPolicy implementation
Policy: MOVEONLY: script/standard.o::IsStandard() -> CPolicy::ApproveScript()

Policy: Refactor: CTxOut::IsDust(CFeeRate) -> CPolicy::ApproveOutput(CTxOut)

Decouples CTxOut from CFeeRate
Simplifies IsDust() interface encapsulating the access to global minRelayTxFee
Also move the new GetDustThreshold() from CTxOut to Policy
Policy: Refactor: Create CPolicy::ApproveTx(tx, state) from main::IsStandardTx(tx, reason)
Policy: MOVEONLY: main::AreInputsStandard() -> CPolicy::ApproveTxInputs()
Includes: Cleanup includes
LOCAL: notes on include main.h

Policy: Replace STANDARD script flags with ALL (which adds SCRIPT_VERIFY_LOW_S) for signing

The new ALL_SCRIPT_VERIFY_FLAGS in script/interpreter is independent from policy
Policy: MOVEONLY: Move CFeeRate to policy
Policy: MOVEONLY-ish: Move CMinerPolicyEstimator out of txmempool.o (CTxMemPoolEntry has to be separated temporarily as well)
Policy: Refactor: Don't pass a CTxMemPool param to CWallet::GetMinimumFee()
Policy: Refactor: Decouple CTxMemPool from CMinerPolicyEstimator and policy::minRelayTxFee
Policy: Refactor: SQUASHED: inline GetMinRelayFee() in AcceptToMemoryPool()
Policy: Refactor: Simplify CheckInputsScripts
Policy: SQUASHME: Refactor: Simplify CheckInputsScripts
Policy: MOVEONLY: CPolicy::ApproveTxInputsScripts from main::CheckInputsScripts
Policy: Refactor: Move datacarrier policy logic to policy.o
Policy: MOVEONLY: Turn fIsBareMultisigStd global into a CStandardPolicy attribute
Policy: Introduce CPolicy attribute in CWallet
Policy: Encapsulate policy script verify flags as CStandardPolicy parameters
Policy: MOVEONLY: initialize global minRelayTxFee in InitPolicyFromArgs())
Refactor: int nHeight = chainActive.Height()
Policy: Separate CPolicy::ValidateTxFee() from main::AcceptToMemoryPool()
Policy: Separate Standard and test policies to select them independently of the network
Policy: Replace CChainParams::fRequireStandard with CChainParams::strDefaultPolicy
Policy: Introduce CPolicy::ValidateFee(CAmount, size_t)
Policy: Introduce CPolicy::ValidateFeeRate(CFeeRate)
Policy: Pass policy as parameter in many main and miner functions
Policy: Introduce CPolicy::GetMinRelayFeeRate()
